exp: Convert speed: 13 km/h = 3.61 m/s. Time = 8 min = 480 s. Distance = speed × time = 3.61×480 ≈ 1733 m.

subject: Physics
q: A body starts with initial velocity 5 m/s and accelerates uniformly at 4 m/s² for 6 s. What is the displacement? (use s=ut+1/2at²)
exp:
Use s = ut + 1/2 a t².
Compute: 5×6 + 0.5×4×6² = 102.0 m.
